sentence.Network_en: These people rolled in wealth and rioted in debauchery.
sentence.Network_cn: 这些人钱财很多,过着荒淫的生活.

sentence.Network_en: They set up a spurious temple that was a cover for sexual debauchery.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们建立起一座为淫秽活动作掩护的假寺庙。

sentence.Network_en: His father died of drink and debauchery when he was three.
sentence.Network_cn: 他三岁时,父亲死于饮酒过度和生活腐化.

entry.def: You use debauchery to refer to the drinking of alcohol or to sexual activity if you disapprove of it or regard it as excessive.

means.word_mean: 1. a wild gathering involving excessive drinking and promiscuity
